directions: Combine soy sauce, marmalade, ketchup, rice wine, sesame oil, and garlic in a bowl. Pour half the sauce into a slow cooker; top with ribs. Drizzle with remaining sauce.
Cover and cook on Low until pork is tender, about 3 hours. Thicken cooking juices in a small skillet over medium heat, if desired.
ingredients: 3 pounds bone-in country style pork ribs
title: Chinese Pork Ribs
